attributes.action: staffordshire bull terriers plus other breeds
attributes.additional_details:
should be law that all staffordshire bull terriers shud be neutered and spayed unless there a reputable breeder KC reg and vett every new owner. to meny unwanted in homes.
 dog licenses brought back in for all breeds of dogs at a max of 2 per house hold or made to have a kennel license if more than 2
